text: In addition, the President’s budget last week included a new account for public-private partnerships (P3s) as a result of legislation I passed last year. This new P3 account & renegotiated PPA are great progress for comprehensive flood protection in RRV. (2/2)

html: We can and should fund the government and secure our borders. I voted to proceed to House-passed CR with $5.7b for border security & disaster assist funds. It is only reasonable that we pass our approps bills, keep the gov open and provide funding for the wall & border security.
text: We can and should fund the government and secure our borders. I voted to proceed to House-passed CR with $5.7b for border security & disaster assist funds. It is only reasonable that we pass our approps bills, keep the gov open and provide funding for the wall & border security.

html: I did not support the continuing resolution because it does not include the funding necessary to secure the border and build the wall, but the legislation was approved by voice vote. The American people want border security, but democrats continue to block funding for it.
text: I did not support the continuing resolution because it does not include the funding necessary to secure the border and build the wall, but the legislation was approved by voice vote. The American people want border security, but democrats continue to block funding for it.

html: Nearly 3 years ago, we lifted a decades-long ban on exporting crude oil. This has helped grow our economy & create jobs while keeping gas prices low & making our nation more secure. For first time on record, U.S. exported more oil than we imported: http://reut.rs/2QgbAde

html: America is a truly blessed nation, & as we remember the pursuit of our ancestors to make a more perfect nation, we look on today with thanks & to the future with optimism. From Mikey, me & our entire family, we wish all North Dakotans a #HappyThanksgiving.

html: June 1969, USS Frank E. Evans collides w/ Australian aircraft carrier, killing 74 American sailors. Collision happened outside designated combat zone, so sailors’ names weren’t added to #VietnamVeterans Memorial. I’ve introduced amendment to NDAA to rectify this.pic.twitter.com/13MgBL8MOZ
text: June 1969, USS Frank E. Evans collides w/ Australian aircraft carrier, killing 74 American sailors. Collision happened outside designated combat zone, so sailors’ names weren’t added to #VietnamVeterans Memorial. I’ve introduced amendment to NDAA to rectify this.pic.twitter.com/13MgBL8MOZ
